job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtTo help Trust scale our products and our team we need an engineer that wants to step into a central role in our company We are looking for an engineer whose work will focus on our core API but will involve projects up and down our stackltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork with product owners to define functional and nonfunctional requirementsltligtltligtDesign software architecture and systems to meet specified requirementsltligtltligtWork closely with technical and nontechnical team membersltligtltligtProduce documentation for software and systemsltligtltligtMaintain and improve the software as neededltligtltligtAssist in building a team of software developers assist with hiring mentorship etcltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired Qualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years of software development experienceltligtltligtExpertise with objectoriented programming languages Particularly PythonltligtltligtExpertise with relational databases Particularly PostgreSQLltligtltligtExperience with API frameworks eg Flask FastAPI Ruby on RailsltligtltligtProven ability to design build and document APIsltligtltligtStrong technical communication skillsltligtltligtResultsfocused collaborative and pragmaticltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtNicetohave QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtFinTech  Finance experienceltligtltligtFamiliarity  Expertise with FastAPI frameworkltligtltligtFamiliarity with Ops platforms tools and processes AWS GCS etcltligtltligtData pipeline experienceltligtltligtFamiliarity with Dockerltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
